name: H.E.R.O. (itch)
description:
Remake of the old game from Atari. It has only 4 levels.
It's a fan based game and it won't be commercialized. The rights belongs to their owners.
Control:
Arrows Right/Left = lateral movement.
Up Arrow = Flight (heli).
Low Arrow = Bomb (if they are over, doors can be knocked over by a long laser).
Espace Bar = Laser.
'S' and 'D' = Toggles background music.
